data.name: Alberto Beltran
data.Profile: Full-Stack & Web3 Developer | Blockchain & Crypto Evangelist | JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB, Express, React, Solidity | Software Engineering student

certificate.description: Diploma of 24 hours duration, approved with 9/10.
certificate.name: Blockchain Technology Diploma

certificate.description: Scholarship given by Santander Universities and BEDU
certificate.name: OPEN Web Development with JavaScript

Academic.description: Currently, I am studying a degree in Software Engineering in one of the best universities in Mexico
I was selected to participate in this intense program over weeks including courses, live classes and expert coaching, with the support of Ethereum Foundation & Road to Devcon.
I won a scholarship to participate in this Web Development bootcamp given by BEDU and Santander Universities.

experience.jobDescription: I feel grateful for being able to be part of the technological revolution.
As a strategy advisor I have been involved in events and workshops for different clients and partners of Mr.Coin.
I worked with clients in Web Development using HTML, CSS, JS and CMS such as WordPress, focusing on E-Commerce using Woocommerce and Elementor.
